# Gini Coefficient, South Korea (SWIID, SOLT 2020)

```{r, include=F, cache=T}
######## Gini, SWIID

download("https://dataverse.harvard.edu/api/access/datafile/5678385", 
         dest = 'swiid9_2.zip', mode='wb')
unzip("swiid9_2.zip")
load(file="swiid9_2/swiid9_2.rda")
rm(swiid) #######3

official <- data.frame(
  year=c(2018:2020),
  official_gini = c(35, 34, 33)
) # SK government's official statistics (index.go.kr)
```

```{r gini, echo=F, message=F, error=F, warning=F, cache=T, fig.width=14}
gini <- swiid_summary %>% 
  filter(year>1964) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=gini_disp)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, color='red', fill='red') +
  geom_ribbon(data=swiid_summary %>%
                filter(country=="Korea"),
              aes(ymin = gini_disp-1.96*gini_disp_se,
                  ymax = gini_disp+1.96*gini_disp_se, 
                  linetype=NA), alpha = .2, fill='blue') +
  geom_line(data=swiid_summary %>%
              filter(country=="Korea"), size=1, color='blue') +
  annotate(geom='text', x=1980, y=38, label="Global Average", color='red', size=7) +
  annotate(geom='text',  x=1983.5, y=32, label="S. Korea", color="blue", size=7) +
  labs(y="Gini Coefficient, Disposable Income") +
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=17),
        axis.title=element_text(size=17),
        legend.position = "none") +
  geom_point(data=official, aes(y=official_gini, x=year), 
             size=2, color='blue', alpha=0.5) +
  geom_segment(aes(x=2013, y=35.5,
                   xend=2017, yend=35),
               arrow = arrow(length=unit(0.25, 'cm'))) +
  annotate(geom='text', x=2008, y=36, 
           'label' = "S. Korea Gov't official Gini", size=7, color='blue', alpha=0.75)

gini

```

# Public Opinions on Fairness <br> .small[(Annual Social Integration Survey, average of 10 indicators)]

```{r fairnessall, echo=F, message=F, error=F, warning=F, cache=T, fig.width=16, fig.height=6.5}

# Fairness, Composite 

k2013_2020 %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(fairness),
            se = sd(fairness)/sqrt(n())) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y=mean, x=year)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_point(color='blue', size=2, alpha=0.85) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean-1.96*se, ymax=mean+1.96*se)) +
  labs(y="Average Fairness (1:v unfair - 4: v fair)") +
  geom_line(color='blue', alpha=0.5, size=1.5) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim=c(2.2, 2.6)) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept=2.5),
             linetype='dashed', color='red', alpha=0.5) + 
    theme(axis.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.title=element_text(size=25),
        legend.position = "none")  -> fairness_all

fairness_all

```
